headline: Ask HN: What is the best streaming device for a Lineage OS user?
description: I run Lineage OS 18 on my Poco X3 Pro. Have just purchased a cheap, non-smart TV and would like to broadcast stuff from my phone using a streaming device. Which device is most compatible with Lineage OS: chromecast, fire stick, roku etc? What would you recommend (ideally something without ads). Thank you.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 对于Lineage OS用户来说，什么是最好的流媒体设备？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 對於Lineage OS用戶來說，什麼是最好的流媒體設備？
description_zh-Hans: 我在我的Poco X3 Pro上运行Lineage OS 18。刚买了一台便宜的非智能电视，想用流媒体设备从我的手机上播放东西。哪种设备与Lineage OS最兼容：chromecast、fire stick、roku等？你会推荐什么（最好是没有广告的）。谢谢你。
description_zh-Hant: 我在我的Poco X3 Pro上運行Lineage OS 18。剛買了一臺便宜的非智能電視，想用流媒體設備從我的手機上播放東西。哪種設備與Lineage OS最兼容：chromecast、fire stick、roku等？你會推薦什麼（最好是沒有廣告的）。謝謝你。
